matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

panels.description:
Read bytes The number of bits read per second per disk partition
Written bytes The number of bits written per second per disk partition.
panels.title: Disk read and write capacity per second

panels.description:
Reads completed: The number of read completions per disk partition per second

Writes completed: Number of write completions per disk partition per second

IO now The number of input/output requests being processed per disk partition per second
panels.title: Disk read and write rate (IOPS)

panels.description:
The time spent on I/O in every second of natural time. (wall-clock time)

node_disk_io_time_seconds_total:
The number of seconds the disk spent on input/output operations. This value is cumulative. (Milliseconds Spent Doing I/Os)

irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total[1m])：
Calculate the rate per second: (last value - last previous value) / timestamp difference, that is: the proportion of time the disk spends on I/O operations within 1 second.

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen

panels.title: Proportion of I/O operation time per second

panels.description:
Read time seconds The number of seconds spent on each disk partition read operation

Write time seconds The number of seconds spent writing each disk partition.

IO time seconds The number of seconds spent on input/output operations per disk partition

IO time weighted seconds Weighted seconds spent on input/output operations per disk partition
panels.title: Time consumption of each IO read and write (reference: less than 100ms)

panels.description:
Sockets_used - Total number of sockets used across all protocols

CurrEstab - Number of TCP connections currently in ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT state

TCP_alloc - the number of allocated (established, sk_buff applied for) TCP sockets

TCP_tw - Number of TCP connections waiting to be closed

UDP_inuse - Number of UDP sockets in use

RetransSegs - Number of TCP retransmission messages

OutSegs - Number of packets sent by TCP

InSegs - Number of packets received by TCP

properties.value: Total number of all protocol sockets used

panels.title: Network Socket connection information

targets.legendFormat: 使用的文件描述符占比_{{instance}}

panels.title: Open file descriptors (left) / number of context switches per second (right)
